WorkItem.Description: The message I keep getting is.... "The application failed to initialize properly.  (0xc0000135).  Click OK to terminate the application. "  I just redid my hard drive so it's a fresh install.  What am I doing wrong, not doing, what can I do to get this to work.

Comments.Message: If you are referring to...  "There's no installer for Rawr (at least, not yet). Just unzip the zip anywhere you like, and run Rawr.exe. (If you have any concern about Rawr doing anything malicious, the full source code is available at http://www.codeplex.com/Rawr/ for you to review and/or to build yourself)"  That's my problem.  When I follow those directions, I get the message I typed out above.

No, what he's referring to is the section that specifically mentions that error code BY NAME.  If you read the readme file - or really, any section of this website - you'd know exactly what he's talking about.
I apologize.  I skipped past that part thinking it was going over previous installments and I went to the instructions.  So I apologize and I thank you.
